intro: Elatostema longicaudatum, commonly known as the long-tailed elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. The plant produces tiny greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Asia, including parts of India and Indonesia. Elatostema longicaudatum is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or rocky crevices.
